attributes.action: Make vital arrangements or adjustments within our policies that British companies are majority British owned rather than in foreign ownership, which is affecting our national interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the years we have seen a drastic change in British company ownership, the one thing from all that will and has affected our county as a whole is when they are owned by foreign investors or companies. For a stable, safe and prosperous future in Britain the majority of our companies must be British majority owned.  This will be achieved, if there is a change in the policy for company takeovers, we must adopt that British companies must have majority British owner ship.
